t: QOR360 - Wikipedia
s: May 14, 2024 - QOR360 (pronounced ‘core 360’) is a line of ergonomic chairs developed by Turner Osler, a trauma surgeon. Osler stated he developed the design after transitioning to a desk job after 30 years in the operating room as a trauma surgeon. In his role as a research epidemiologist, Osler spent up to 60 hours a week sitting ...
